title: IdeaDeck Team
about: Lightweight web-app to generate idea deck with call to action buttons
description: Helping innovators, entrepreneurs, and non-profits clearly and concisely explain their idea and product.
witty_note: Support IdeaDeck, buy us a coffee.
ideas: With over 100 million businesses are launched annually.
Innovators need ways to convey their idea clearly to their audience.
IdeaDeck: Easily create, host and share your ideas with call to action buttons.
Works on all devices, ultra-light weight (~ 4 KB) and doesn't require any javascript.

highlights.title: Payment Gateway
highlights.description: Sell products, collect donations, Become super rich: powered by PayPal.

highlights.title: Universal
highlights.description: Accessible light-weight page that works in all major browsers including Lynx ;)

highlights.title: Open Source
highlights.description: Checkout out our github and start hacking. Don't forget to star our repo.
